inclusion.criterion: Asymptomatic severe aortic stenosis (Vmax > 3.5 m/sec and aortic valve area < 1 cm2)
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: TTE revealed severe aortic stenosis with worsening LV function.

notes: Patient's aortic insufficiency is described as '2+ aortic insufficiency', which may be considered severe, but the exact severity is unclear. Further clarification would be needed to determine eligibility.
